title: I asked a battery question here and I got this: Failed to post. Content violates Community Policy?
content:
I was asking a question about the amount of time charging on a Google Cradle, but it says it violates community policy?The question was "I want to make sure am I not overcharging the phone in the cradle. How long can I leave it there? I want to know the best way to extend the battery life of my Pixel 3 xl"
 Anyone with experience can tell me why? Thanks!
